      • createUniformTree

        public static Pair<RBTree,NamesMap> createUniformTree(java.lang.String treeName,
                                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> leafNames,
                                      PRNG prng)
        Creates a uniform bifurcating tree by simply joining two random vertices into a cherry until all have been joined.
        Parameters:
        treeName - the tree parameter's name.
        leafNames - leaf names of the tree to be created.
        prng - pseudo-random number generator.
        Returns:
        tree and its names map.
